description: Standard table definitions for LSTs (liquid staking tokens)

tables.label: Position Snapshot
tables.description: User level snapshot of holders in this protocol.

token_address.description: The contract address of the LST.

user_address.description: The address of the user holding the LST.

amount.description: The amount of LST tokens held in the protocol, decimal normalized.

tables.label: Protocol Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot at the protocol level, including, TVL and fees data.

total_value_locked_usd.description: The total value locked in USD (ie, the value of the liquid staking tokens in the protocol).

fees_usd.description: The fees collected in USD in the given snapshot period.
